title: House For Sale in Moratuwa
details:
Two story house in Moratuwa – Uyana Road

300 metrs from Galle road, 200 Metrs to Uyana Rd

The house consists of 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, Dining room, Living room & 2 car parking slots

Very close to St. Sebastian’s College in Moratuwa

Land extent -10 perches
25 feet wide road access

Price:- 22.5 M (negotiable)

Please call for more information
